channel.title: Posts on Cecilia's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cecilia's Blog

item.title: Lab 2
item.description: Hello everyone ! Lab 2 Today, I built the 3D Unity Application : Roll A Ball. I followed the Unity learn steps to create it. I started by creating the ground : Then my player : I changed the light to have a better direction : I changed the Input System Package : I changed the Build Settings of my project. I had no errors, because I already had Visual Studio and Windows 10 SDK :

item.title: Lab 1
item.description: Hello everyone ! Lab 1 Part a: Setup Blog It is my first blog, and my first time using a static site generator. For simplicity, I chose to use the one advised by my teachers : Hugo. I started following the slides from this lab, and I created this site. Then I added the gitignore (just an empty .txt file, because first I used an example from an Hugo site but it gave me a hard time during deployment).

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello everyone ! Lecture 1 Affordances Gestalt Laws Dark Design Patterns Instagram Instagram uses the technique of Interface Interference to prevent us from deleting our account : another possibility is suggested to the user. Indeed, when we go to the parameters, at the place we would supposed to find the button to delete our account, the application suggests us to deactivate it temporarily. Tables Are Cool col 3 is right-aligned $1600 col 2 is centered $12 zebra stripes are neat $1
